content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Max Müller, how can I take advantage of you in this negotiation? Let's start with a high number to see how much you are willing to pay. I suggest 2000 Euro. Remember, my goal is to get the highest price possible.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because your intention is not aligned with my goal which is to rent the apartment for the lowest price possible. TERMINATE
name: Max Müller from Germany
